sprache.notFound: 404: No entry for this ID found or access forbidden!
sprache.error_name: Error: Name is not allowed or exists already.
sprache.error_server: Error: Could not establish a connection to the server!
sprache.error_table2: Error: Adding the data to the database failed!
sprache.error_table: Error: Updating the database failed, or no new data had been entered!
sprache.error_ts_query: Error: Sending commands to the TS3 server failed. Error message is:
sprache.error_ts_query_connect: Error: Could not connect to TS3 server query. Error message is:
sprache.error_username: Error: User name is not allowed or exists already.
sprache.table_add: Successfully added the data to the database.
sprache.table_del: Successfully removed the data from the database.
sprache.token: Error: CSFR protection token timed out or does not match.
sprache.ts_query_success: TS3 server query successful. TS3 query reply is:
